message: Let's split it 60/40, it's a fair start!
I think a 55/45 split is more fair. Let's start with that!
I'm willing to compromise, let's try 65/35. It's still a fair split, but I'm willing to give a bit more to Bob this time.
I'm willing to go back to my last offer. A 45/55 split seems fair, and I'm willing to accept that.
